original_text: They must not say bad things about anyone. They must not quarrel with people. Instead, they should be kind and polite to everyone.
korean_text: 아무도 비방하지 말며 다투지 말며 관용하며 범사에 온유함을 모든 사람에게 나타낼 것을 기억하게 하라

sentences.original_text: They must not say bad things about anyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누구에 대해 나쁜 말을 해서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: They must not quarrel with people.
